h2_title: Where To Use The Sobering Stone in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Sobering Stone is a part of the boar man's side quest in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. To get him to move from the Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat Shrine, you need to hand him the Sobering Stone. From there, you can also hand him a Jade Lotus at Crouching Tiger Temple - Temple Entrance. Finally, returning to his original location with the Arhat Gold Piece in your inventory will cause him to attack you, and defeating him will open up the Kingdom of Sahali and the boss fights: Tiger Vanguard (Kingdom of Sahali) "Tiger Vanguard \(Kingdom of Sahali\)") and Fuban.
